adDetails: Services we offer are interior residential and commercial painting with meticulous attention to detail, specializing in Venetian Plaster, plaster reliefs, Faux finishes, antiquing/distressing, woodgrain, cabinet refinishing, No job too small. I've been painting for 30+years, Licenced, Bonded, serving the North Bay wine country and surrounding areas. We offer senior discounts, free estimates, color consulting and guarantee our work. We take pride in a job well done. Your satisfaction is of utmost importance. View my online portfolio here: http://www.dropbox.com/gallery/33312307/1/Ambiance%20Designs?h=01c7b3 References on request. Call Ryan at show contact info
